meanings.definition: Relating to or involving physical work or energy
meanings.sent1: The ergometric exercises helped improve my strength and stamina.
meanings.sent2: She used an ergometric chair to support her back during long work hours.
meanings.sent3: The ergometric treadmill made me feel like a superhero, powering through the miles.
meanings.sent4: His ergometric determination to finish the race inspired everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The ergometric nature of the job required constant movement and effort.

meanings.definition: A device or method used to measure physical work or energy
meanings.sent1: The gym instructor used an ergometric to track the calories burned during the workout.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calibrated the ergometric to accurately measure the energy output.
meanings.sent3: The ergometric beeped loudly when it reached the maximum energy level.
meanings.sent4: The ergometric displayed the impressive power generated by the athlete.
meanings.sent5: Using the ergometric, she could monitor her daily physical activity levels.

meanings.definition: Designed to improve physical performance or efficiency
meanings.sent1: The ergometric training program enhanced the athletes' speed and agility.
meanings.sent2: The ergometric bicycle was specifically built for high-intensity workouts.
meanings.sent3: His ergometric shoes seemed to make him run faster than usual.
meanings.sent4: The ergometric design of the car reduced fuel consumption significantly.
meanings.sent5: The ergometric modifications to the equipment increased productivity in the factory.
